graphs.description: List of list of ints. Defines clique structures of multiple graphs.

measurement_error_mitigation.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default: True

Fidelity_&#x3BC;.description: Mean MRF fidelity over all runs.

Fidelity_&#x3C3;.description: Standard deviation of MRF fidelity over all runs.

KL_&#x3BC;.description: Mean Kullback-Leibler divergence over all runs.

KL_&#x3C3;.description: Standard deviation of Kullback-Leibler divergence over all runs.

SR_&#x3BC;.description: Mean RUS success-rate for real part extraction over all runs.

SR_&#x3C3;.description: Standard deviation of RUS success-rate for real part extraction over all runs.

Depth_&#x3BC;.description: Mean circuit depth over all runs.

Depth_&#x3C3;.description: Standard deviation of circuit depth over all runs.

all_results.description: A dictionary containing information about each specific run.

inputs.description: A dictionary of the serialized input keyword arguments. The type is Dict[str, Any].
